product_name: Toysmith Magnetic Tic Tac Toe Travel Game
long_description: This Magnetic Tic Tac Toe travel game from Toysmith puts a fun twist on a classic game that travels well for road trips, airplane rides and general on-the-go fun. 5.5 in. tin box with magnetic game pieces lets your young ones create a game board anywhere; no pencils or paper necessary. Magnetic Tic Tac Toe travel game is recommended for ages 6 and up.
short_description: This Magnetic Tic Tac Toe travel game from Toysmith puts a fun twist on a classic game that travels well for road trips, airplane rides and general on-the-go fun.
